title: [Control systems] Schneider Electric security advisory (AV25-675)
description: On October 14, 2025, Schneider Electric published advisories to address a vulnerability in the following products:
products: EcoStruxure  OPC UA Server Expert  versions prior to SV2.01 SP3
EcoStruxureTM Modicon Communication Server  all versions
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
